entities.name: cupboard
entities.description: The cupboard is mentioned as being under the stairs. ("a cupboard under the stairs")

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as a family member of Harry's. ("by Uncle Vernon")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned as having come home. ("the instant Harry had come home")

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are introduced as Harry's family members. ("What did the Dursleys care...")

relationships.description: Harry is a member of the Dursley family. ("the instant Harry had come home")
Uncle Vernon is a member of Harry's family. ("by Uncle Vernon")
